Package com.walkfares.calendar

Class CurveDate

java.lang.Object
com.walkfares.calendar.UTCDate
com.walkfares.calendar.CurveDate
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<UTCDate>
public class CurveDate
extends UTCDate
CurveDate is an extension of UTCDate with an attached Expiry Calendar

    • getRelative

      public RelativePeriodCode getRelative​(PeriodCode pc)
      Convert an absolute period code into a relative period code. This uses the expiry date and counts back until the curve date is met
      Parameters:
      pc - The period code to convert
      Returns:
      The relative version of pc

    • getAbsolute

      public AbsolutePeriodCode getAbsolute​(PeriodCode pc)
      Convert a relative period code to an absolute period code. This method has to make a guess at the absolute period and use getRelative to verify it
      Parameters:
      pc - The period code to convert
      Returns:
      The absolute version of pc

    • getExpiry

      public UTCDate getExpiry​(PeriodCode pc)
      Get the expiry date of a contract.
      Parameters:
      pc - The contract period code
      Returns:
      The expiry or last trading day of the contract
